page.title: 04Some Games I Play
page.content: I play with Lego at home. With Lego you can build almost anything, like space-ships, cars, lorries, houses and a space station too. I have many more toys. I have some farm toys. I have a Renault Tractor, a Massey Ferguson Tractor and many more. At school I play "It", where one person chases the rest of us. I play lots of other games like Knight Rider. I play with my friends Gareth and Steven. I put up my 1st finger on one hand and I put up my 1st finger on my other hand. I am the steering wheel of Knight Rider. Gareth is Micheal Knight and Steven is the lorry that Knight Rider parks in. Kit is the nickname for the car. We like to play games. They help us to learn and to have fun.
